scripts.release:dashboard: npm run build && cd .. && zip -r dashboard.zip data/ && mv dashboard.zip ./release/dashboard.zip
scripts.release:firmware: cd .. && pio run && mkdir -p release && grep '^\[env:' platformio.ini | sed 's/.*\[env:\(.*\)\].*/\1/' | while read env; do [ -f .pio/build/$env/firmware.bin ] && cp .pio/build/$env/firmware.bin ./release/firmamint-$env.bin; done
scripts.release: npm run release:dashboard && npm run release:firmware
scripts.pio:upload:monitor: npm run pio:upload && npm run pio:monitor
scripts.build:uploadfs: npm run build && npm run pio:uploadfs
scripts.build:uploadfs:monitor: npm run build && npm run pio:uploadfs && npm run pio:monitor
scripts.build:uploadfs:pio:upload:monitor: npm run build && npm run pio:uploadfs && npm run pio:build && npm run pio:upload && npm run pio:monitor
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run pio:uploadfs && npm run pio:upload && npm run pio:monitor
